entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character mentioned in the article as running away from the scene where Dumbledore fell.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who fell or was pushed, and is being discussed by Skeeter in her book.

entities.name: skeeter
entities.description: The author of the book mentioned in the article, who has written about Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: A person against whom Potter gave evidence, and with whom he has a grudge.

entities.name: hogwarts castle
entities.description: The location where Dumbledore fell or was pushed.

entities.name: wizarding community
entities.description: A group of people who will decide what to believe about the events described in Skeeter's book.

relationships.description: Potter was seen running away from the scene where Dumbledore fell or was pushed.
Skeeter wrote about Dumbledore's death in her book.
The Wizarding community will decide what to believe about the events described in Skeeter's book.
